Content:
我其實不太確定我是否存在。我是我有我讀過的作家、所有遇過的人、所有愛過的女人、所有曾經到訪過的城市。
I am not sure that I exist, actually. I am all the writers that I have read, all the people that I have met, all the women that I have loved; all the cities I have visited.
Author:
阿根廷詩人
Jorge Luis Borges

Content:
那些瘋狂到覺得自己可以改變世界的人，才是真正改變世界的人。
The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
Author:
賈伯斯
Steve Jobs

Content:
要記住，大愛與大成就必定也藏著極大的冒險。
Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
Author:
達賴喇嘛
The Dalai Lama

Content:
愛情之樹應該深深紮根在泥土中，而起枝條則要伸展於廣闊的天空。
Love should be a tree whose roots are deep in the earth, but whose branches extend into heaven.
Author:
伯特蘭·羅素
Bertrand Russell

Content:
最好的關係是你愛別人的程度，超過你需要別人的程度。
Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
Author:
達賴喇嘛
The Dalai Lama

Content:
做一個愛者，而非戰者，但永遠要為你所愛而戰。
Be a lover, not a fighter. But always fight for what you love.
Author: Unknown

Content:
人的天性就是如此，他最樂意將愛給予那些似乎最不強求愛的人。
Human nature is so constructed that it gives affection most readily to those who seem least to demand it.
Author:
伯特蘭·羅素
Bertrand Russell

Content:
記得，那些最幸福的人，不是得到最多的人，而是有更多東西能夠給予的人。
Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Content:
就像他們說的，人會死兩次。一次是我們停止呼吸，另一次是最後一個我們認識的人叫出我們的名字。
They say, people die twice. Once, when the breath leaves our body, and once when the last person they know says their name.
Author: Unknown

Content:
你掌控你自己的命運，不需要任何魔法來幫助你做到這點！問題的解決方法也沒有任何神奇的捷徑。
You control your destiny ─ you don't need magic to do it.
And there are no magical shortcuts to solving your problems.
Author: 勇敢傳說

Content:
先挑戰自己的認知。你的認知是你觀望世界的窗；不時擦拭，光線才能穿透。
Begin challenging your own assumptions. Your assumptions are your windows on the world. Scrub them off every once in a while, or the light won't come in.
Author:
亞 倫‧艾達，美國演員
Alan Alda

Content:
從哪裡來無所謂，重點是要往哪去。
It isn't where you came from; it's where you're going that counts.
Author:
艾拉‧費茲傑羅，美國爵士女伶
Ella Fitzgerald

Content:
智慧之道在於懂得視而不見。
The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
Author:
威廉‧詹姆斯，美國心理學家
William James

Content:
在寸步維艱時還能堅持前進的人就是贏家。
The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win.
Author:
羅傑‧班尼斯特，英國長跑運動員
Roger Bannister

Content:
船待港內固然安全，但船的目的就是要出海探索新天地。
A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for. Sail out to sea and do new things.
Author:
葛蕾斯‧哈柏，美國電腦科學家
Grace Hopper

Content:
人最可怕的時候莫過於他們自以為有理而且對此毫不懷疑。
Human beings are perhaps never more frightening than when they are convinced beyond doubt that they are right.
Author:
勞倫斯‧凡‧德‧普司特，南非探險家兼作家
Laurens van der Post
